channel.title: Friends Concerts on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Friends Concerts on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Britiney Spears
item.description: I am so excited. I get to see some really crazy concerts soon. First on Sunday i get to see the TRL tour, with Nelly, Eve and Destiny’s Child. Then on the following wednesday, i am going to see Madonna. Then on the next friday, built to spill is playing, and then way ahead in october, modest mouse. So looks like i am gunna be super busy(at least for four nights in the next two months:)).
